author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
This PR is to disable JME nano workflows for now, to avoid crash in IB. The crash is due to the ongoing dev of Nano-prompt where JME should fix their sequence.

#### PR validation:
-

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
Not a backport, and no need of backport.
title: Disable JME Nano workflows due to Nano-prompt dev
